description:
A Bubble Nebula color picture.
The raw data were taken from 2014->2016 by Mr. Morten la Cour and Niels V. Christensen.

The equipment/gear used by Morten:
Orion Optics ultra 300 f/4 mirror. TS 2.5 inch Wynne corrector, AP1600GTO, Qsi660wsg, SX superstar OAG guiding, Astrodon 5 nm filters, Ha.

The best Ha frames (with the lowest FWHM) was used as Luminace info. to make this detailed picture of the Bubble Nebula.
It is shown as a Lum(80%Ha)-LRHaGOIIIBOIII picture.
Ha exposure data from Morten la Cour: 71x300sec.

Here's a dropbox link to Morten's Ha picture,
https://www.dropbox.com/s/5tdzvysfapu9sly/BubbleMlC-HaCrop100pct.jpg?dl=0

More picture/exposure details can also be seen here:
http://meade4m.com/index.php?/topic/4425-the-bubble-nebula/

More exposure/picture details have been added, please see below in the comments section, thanks a lot. Now added here also:
Exposure times: Lum=32x30sec+17x60sec+21x120sec=75min. Ha=4x600sec=40min and OIII=13x300sec=65min. R,G,B=61,49,40x60sec=150min. SII=23x300sec.

On request I will be happy to share/show tif/fit files/stack info, please just let me know, thanks.
Kind regards Niels
title: Bubble Nebula, 2014->2016
